conbody.p: To view the data files in this sample project, in the Test Explorer panel, go to Data Files > Product List/Multiple Checkout.

image.alt: Data files in the Shopping Cart sample

conbody.p: Alternatively, you can go to <your-project-folder>\Data Files and choose the file you want to open:

ul.li: Constants.xlsx contains Product List and Multiple Checkout sheets.
Product List.dat is a list of products you want to add to the shopping cart.
Multiple Checkout.dat is a list of the customer's personal information needed for shipping on the Checkou page.
